website_summaries.verdict: A remarkably lightweight design showcasing a fitted build alongside helpful weather technology.
pros: Pockets are zippered for easy storing
Lightweight material is water-resistant for inclement weather conditions
cons: Down feathers have a tendency to come out of the seams

customer_reviews.title: I took a chance on this one and I was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Had a jacket very similar to this one and they stopped making the brand. I was very upset because for three years I could not find a comparable jacket. I took a chance on this one and I was very happy with it! My biggest concern was bulkiness because I hate driving with a big, bulky coat. This coat is very lightweight and pretty warm too! Jacket came very quick with my amazon prime and I'm really happy I took the chance on it. Considering buying in another color as well. The navy blue is a nice change from my regular go to of black.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Down feathers pop out at the seams!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really was excited to receive this jacket. My daughter has the same one in girl's sizes. I have only owned the jacket for a month and a half, and the down feathers keep popping out of the seams. It keeps sticking to my car seats and office chair. I followed the care tag instructions exactly, and today when I took it out of the dryer, the down was clumpy in the jacket, and some parts had no down at all. Some parts had no down at all as shpwn in the photos. I wouldn't recommend this...save up for a better made jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Ca

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this jacket because I don't think it is worth the money or warm enough. It also just about fits and If I were to wear heavy sweaters underneath it wouldn't fit. I live in Rhode Island and need warm jackets for our cold winters. I thought this packable jacket would be warm like LLBean's or Land's End, but it's not warm
customer_reviews.author: Maru

customer_reviews.title: Beware-- size does not run small!
customer_reviews.text: Disregard advice that the coat runs small. I sized up after reading reviews and was swimming in it when it arrived, even with a blocky sweater on. I had to return and size down to my regular size, I'm confident I'll still have room for sweaters. As for the confusion about the "inner pockets without bottom seams"-- those are the outside hand pockets, not inner pockets. No design error. No frills construction means it does the job but doesn't inspire confidence that it will last a long time. One thing you should be aware of though is that this coat is for minimum 35-40 degree weather. It is quite light.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I travel a lot and sometimes I just want a light carry jacket. This is perfect! It is so soft and very light weight. The navy color is beautiful. The quality is very good, very well made product. I haven't tried it in the cold but I have faith it will perform well. I'm normally a medium and I ordered a size up and it fits perfect. 5'1" 145 Lbs. The sleeve and hip length are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Stang

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Light grey looks very similar to a name brand puffer. Fits flatteringly on the waist and hips, not too baggy but roomy enough to layer. It’s pretty warm too. I stand out in the open in the mornings and this jacket is good on its own in mild 40+ weather. I do layer with a fleece vest under and a longer puffer on top of it’s below 40. It handles misty rain really well. Didn’t risk through.
customer_reviews.author: Justpeachy85

customer_reviews.title: Cute, lightweight but runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are cute jackets but run quite small. I wear a small or a medium and i can barely close the medium jacket. I gave the small one to my daughter. They're not designed for freezing cold weather but would be perfect for spring. Since i'm losing weight anyway i'm sure eventually my medium one will zip up too!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Nesta

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really fit through hips
customer_reviews.text: Con: Purchased a medium first because that’s what I typically wear (5’4” - 150#) but had to return because too tight through hips. So I purchased a Large. It’s too big for me everywhere except it’s still awfully tight through hips. Argh!!! (And I’m not “hippy” really.) Minus one ⭐️ - Also, there’s no cord on the hood which is probably fine because it’s nice & deep but I’m not gonna be a happy camper if that thing flies off in the wind & rain. Pros: It is very lightweight and super packable - which is the primary purpose of the purchase - for an upcoming trip to somewhere cold in Oct. will give an update after the trip.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great for unpredictable weather
customer_reviews.text: I live in Texas so it’s hot, it’s cold, it’s rainy, and it’s windy all in one week. I needed something a little dressier for going out and a little thicker but but not unnecessarily thick as the weather is so back and forth here. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the material, it feels so comfortable and defiantly the perfect thickness for this crazy weather. I got it in black and in a size large, I’m 5’5 so the sleeves were perfect, they didn’t overlap on my hands. I am bustier in the chest so maybe an XL would have for a little better but overall it fits just fine
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It’s pretty basic and on the thinner side, comes with a pouch for travel/hiking. Perfect for fall/early spring for just a little bit of warmth. Slim fitting and not bulky. I bought the olive color and I love it! For reference I am 5’3”, 130lbs and the small fits on the snug side, which I prefer. The sleeves have the perfect length for me, but may be too short for somebody tall.
customer_reviews.author: Gingercanbark

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size large which should have been ample for me. I could not zip it with a sweater underneath. I would not give it two stars just for sizing, however. The jacket had a powerful VOC smell when I opened the bag. I cannot figure out how a simple down jacket could have such a powerful odor. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Diverse Interests

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. It was easy to carry in my backpack in the stuff sack. Pulled it out once we reached our destination. Served me well for a cold, rainy week in the Pacific Northwest. Kept me very warm even though it’s thin and not bulky. Kept me dry in the rain too. Looked comparable to the hundreds of Patagonia/NorthFace/Columbia ones that I saw in Seattle. Didn’t want to spend a ton of money because I live in a warm climate and won’t need it very often. LOVED the zippered pockets for stashing my sunglasses, eye glasses and my plus size iPhone. I’m 5’9” 140lbs. Medium was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Bates

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This coat is great for the winter when you're on the go and don't want to carry around a big puffy jacket. I wouldn't say it's warm for extremely cold days but it gets the job done. (Certainly not for skiing or other outside sports.) The best part is that it folds up very small. It also wash as well. (Make sure you follow the directions.)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Wyks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those not too cold days
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only worn it once but it seems like it’s going to do the job for me. Lightweight jacket for those in between days. Love that it has a hood. Based off reviews I ordered an XL, but it was too big. I’m 5’10 and a size 12. The large fits good and the sleeves are long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F

customer_reviews.title: Folds away easily - fits as described - I was nervous about ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Wanted something that was light to travel with and could wear over a sweater/fleece if very cold. Folds away easily - fits as described - I was nervous about buying a Small so went with the Medium which fits perfectly - I'm 5'3" 125lbs and didn't want it to be too snug. Arm length good and covers hips and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it, you truly won’t regret it! I bought this jacket a couple of months ago to use it on our trip to NY city and it certainly did not disappoint. The jacket is very warm, comfortable and it works great as a windbreaker. The part that sold it for me was the fact that I could shrivel it up to a pouch and it will take a very small space in my apartment. Loved it so much I bought a second one. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! My favorite jacket!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite jackets of all time. I bought it for backpacking, but I wear it all the time on chilly days. It's comfortable and lightweight. I am 5'4" and 170 lbs, and I ordered XL. It's comfortably loose so I have plenty of room to layer if I want. The long sleeves others have complained about haven't been an issue for me, and I consider my arms average length. I love that it's packable. I wouldn't wear it in the rain even though it's water resistant. I don't want the down to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I like it, however I do wish I had gone ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, however I do wish I had gone up a size. I am a solid medium (size 8, occasionally 10 for fitted blazers) 5'3", while the jacket fits - it is just a smidgen tight in the shoulders when I wear heavier sweaters or multiple layers.
customer_reviews.author: ASN

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 23 year old daughter. She is 5'1, 140 pounds, we bought medium and it fits her great. She really loves it. The jacket is lightweight and easily packable. It is not warm enough for super cold weather but typical 30s and up temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight yet warm
customer_reviews.text: Very warm on the coldest days, and extremely lightweight! This jacket fits perfectly and weighs almost nothing. It fits into a small matching bag that came with it. I wish all of my clothes were as "packable" as this jacket, and took up as little space in my closet. I'm waiting for a designer to come up with packable pants, sweaters and shirts. Amazon Basics, please make this happen! Great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hale

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. I bought a size up thinking it ran small but I was wrong. It's true too size. Jacket feels good, light and comfortable. Very stylish. I had to return and ordered a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until I washed it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jacket. It went to Nepal, Bhutan and Ireland... then I washed it according to the instructions. Now it is a windbreaker with little balls of stuffing here and there... Be careful when you wash it.. It's too late to return, or I would but if I did it over again I would wash very gently by hand not, inside out gentle machine wash... this didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: VO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.  Light weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light weight jacket. The material and workmanship are excellent. I have not had it long enough to wash it but I will offer a suggestion to people. Get some Laura Ashley laundry bags. I have several and wash all my delicates in them. When I have to wash this jacket i will use one. They really save wear and tear on your clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Folston

customer_reviews.title: It smelled used and lacked a packing bag. USED.
customer_reviews.text: Going to travel today so I had to buy this last minute. Sadly, it came smelling of perfume and lacking a packing bag. No tags either. Can't return now as my flight leaves in a few hours. Doubtful if I will ever use Amazon wardrobe again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: This garment was more like a sweater and a light weight one at that
customer_reviews.text: This garment was more like a sweater and a light weight one at that. I love this because it will pack up into a small bag and I can keep in my purse or backpack.Since we will be walking and traveling by train and bus this will come in handy during a misty rain. Oh in the UK , which why I purchased this jacket. And it was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE!!!  I WILL KEEP CHECKING BACK FOR MORE AMAZON ESSENTIALS PRODUCTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd item I bought from the Amazon Essentials clothing line. I first bought the Men's lightweight packable down vest for my husband, and I liked his so much, I had to buy this one for myself. The only thing I would change, if I were Amazon, is to source a better fabric. Eventually, after enough wear and washing, the down feathers start coming through the fabric. Other than that, we really like these outerwear pieces. And AMAZON: I'd pay $5 more for these items if you sourced a better shell fabric : ) No worries there!
customer_reviews.author: riverashopperny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. I am tall (5’9”) and the medium has lib enough sleeves. Warm and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Mattf1j1

customer_reviews.title: Sheds feathers like crazy, otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, good price, is thin, light, and packable, but it sheds feathers like crazy. The material feels like it would tear fairly easily, but that's true of all jackets in this style.
customer_reviews.author: K. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered a size up
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but warm. Glad I ordered a size up. I needed this for a trip and it’ll meet that need. Problem is that after wearing prior to the trip for 2 weeks the inner material is coming out at seams. Won’t wear now until my trip. Not durable in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is light weight and kept me warm on ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is light weight and kept me warm on my trip. When I returned from my trip, I washed the jacket, following the care tag instructions, I did not put it in the dryer, the down is now clumpy and some parts have no down at all. I would have given this jacket a 5 star but after the one wash, I down rated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but also annoying jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a good jacket. But you first have to deal with months of the little feathers coming out of everywhere. They're white and jab you, look weird and I'm sure it could be embarrassing for some people. It makes the jacket seem really cheap, but it does eventually stop. Otherwise good jacket though.
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit and feel! If you were thinking about getting this, go ahead and right swipe the ‘buy it now’ button because it’s well worth it. I recommend ordering the size you would comfortably wear a unisex t-shirt in. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year now and I love it! Incredibly warm & relatively water proof for cold & rainy fall weather. Great to travel with- compresses well. My only issue is that it does lose feathers regularly. Like with every use. They’re tiny, so it’s more of a little nuisance. Hasn’t stopped me from wearing it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Multiple broken stitches.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a size large but it was too small in the bust. I exchanged it for this XL. I still think the bust is small for a traditional XL. The jacket is very warm and comfy but has multiple stitching errors. Several places have pulled stitches and material gathered due to sewing errors. I was disappointed in the quality at this price point. This is a $20 jacket. Not a $40 item.
customer_reviews.author: LathemFamily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: This coat was all it claims to be! The color was really perfect for just neutral common and we were in Chicago when it was super windy and cold and rainy, and I was warm as could be! The best thing about it is it's not too heavy at all - and not too hit on a warmer day. Also, it does fit in the bag perfectly. That helps so much with packing! I would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket !
customer_reviews.text: I really love this jacket, have only had it a few days and already worn it several times, both in 50 degree weather and 32 degree ( with layers) and it works great. I have the pink one and I love the color. Maybe I will get another one in a different color. But I do really like this jacket! I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Its okay , Saw feathers
customer_reviews.text: I did size up this purchase and it fit perfect. It does squish small. I took this jacket out on my 7 day trip and saw a few feathers. I also noticed in comparison to other people wearing the same jacket style that mine looked lower quality, as in, it was less full. Other than that it was perfect for me and will still be using it. I have not washed it yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Elmsbalm

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Becomes really compact when rolled up. And warm for chilly weather. I wore this in Alaska, high 60's, low 70's and was super easy to bring around with me and take on and off as needed. Nice fit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: It is always tricky to buy clothing online. I'm 5'4" and 120lb, this jackets looks very nice on me. Not baggy, fits the body shape nicely, very warm and the color light grey is very pretty. I'm happy with my purchase and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: lunatk

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good, only problem is inside pocket didn’t seal
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, only problem is inside pocket didn’t seal, called customer service for replacement , they didn’t allow .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a steal. This is SO soft and warm. Not thick either, which I love because I hate driving in a stiff coat. This works well in snow & in the rain! I am just obsessed with the lavender color a well! And not to mention it's packable. This is an excellent price and very comparable to the overprice fad-brands that sell jackets like this for well for $100 for the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: It's very warm and the color was perfect (!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket as a replacement for my current winter jacket. It's very warm and the color was perfect (!!), however it's very, very small. I did end up having to return it which i was sad about and they didn't make a bigger size which was unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is amazing! It is very lightweight and easy to fold up and fit into a gallon size Ziploc bag ! I didn’t have any luck fitting it into the bag that it came with It is not only cute, but it is very warm! I would definitely buy this again! It is like a lightweight down jacjet!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki K. Forte

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for travel, but in chilly weather didn't insulate as well as other jackets.
customer_reviews.author: DrJones

customer_reviews.title: Good Packable Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket to go hiking in Moab on a girl's weekend trip. It is true to size, packable, and lightweight. It is warm enough with layers and kept me warm in 27 degrees with wind chills! I like how the bag can stay attached (easy to pack!) and this jacket also has a hood which was perfect in the rain. Highly recommend. Only complaint I have is the feathers tend to show, but I can live with that!
customer_reviews.author: Riley B

customer_reviews.title: May Run Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Runs too small. Otherwise, would have been perfect - color, the material, and the fact that this has a hood.
customer_reviews.author: Ana P.

customer_reviews.title: Sheds a little
customer_reviews.text: But you can’t even tell unless you wear black all the time. The little feathers come out over time. I’ve had it 3 months, never washed it so it’s just shedding because of wear. For the price it’s ok. Fits as expected. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: AdKINS

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing jacket for the price. LL Bean sells a similar listhtweight down jacket for over $200–I had two of them and the zipper broke within weeks on both of them. This jacket has a much better zipper, adequate pockets, a nice hood, and is surprisingly warm.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scheide

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, rain resistant but dries fast.
customer_reviews.text: Actually, fit better than expected! Warm as toast on a MN campouts. Sat out by the lake at midnight, as the frost began to form with no campfire and was fine. Went inn after about a half hour because I was nodding off. Light as a feather, too
customer_reviews.author: PDXsays

customer_reviews.title: Great Packable Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while back for a trip to Wyoming that I just returned from. It was great! It's lightweight but warm, packable in its own little bag and I lost very little down, maybe 3-4 very little feathers. I usually wear a small but bought a medium for layering and it was perfect. Looking to buy one as a gift now.
customer_reviews.author: beccaL

customer_reviews.title: Throughly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Same quality as expensive name brand coats, but for a fraction of the price. I had been looking at and searching far more expensive vendors online and decided to give this one a try. I am not disappointed at all. I am very impressed with quality and fit. The color is great too. I even wore it skiing last week. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MTAdams

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a few days
customer_reviews.text: don't even try to wash it. I followed instructions in the tag but it turned into a bag full of cotton balls on the edges. Not possible to wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Spring
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wrap for variable Spring days. Note that the down is light and this jacket is not for frigid winter, but good when we go from cold and windy to warm in a two block walk. Nice hood when the jacket is completely zipped.
customer_reviews.author: Jobaby

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and flattering. It isn’t too thin but it’s still somewhat thick and SUPER warm + it fits true to size which is the best. Looks like those designer down jackets!! Also comes with the little bag to pack it in. Love this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Shedding Feathers
customer_reviews.text: I am so bummed about this product. I saw it in July and ordered it before the season to wear it. I have worn it now about three times, since it is now cold enough in California, and now every time I wear it, feathers completely cover whatever I have on underneath the coat. I would return it if I could, but it’s now past the return deadline. I don’t know if the coat is defective or if this is typical.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: she loves it
customer_reviews.text: the fit was great. now she wants cold weather to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pouch missing
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be in good condition. I have bought this coat for a trip that I plan to backpack. Unfortunately the coat did not come with the pouch :( guess I’ll have to find something to stick it in.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Doane

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure that this jacket would work for my travel to London but it was PERFECT!! Super lightweight but performs fantastically. Great at blocking the winds and with the hood, it did a great job keeping me warm. I wore a sweater and scarf under it and still had room to move. Love that you can keep the little bag attached to the jacket so that you can roll it up at anytime and carry it around. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: As expected.. good quality .
customer_reviews.text: Nice Jacket, Arrived today, color a bit daker as I was expecting. Extremely light, and foldable, it's very convininente and fits very well. I could have order a Litle one, since it's a bit big as expected but It doesn't matter I can wear thick jerseys under that jacket and it will keep me warm . It seems warm, I cannot tell yet how good is protecting from colders temperatures, but so far Im very glad with this product and I would recomend it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: maria luisa gomez jimenez

customer_reviews.title: but overall I am happy with this jacket and it is very compact
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a trip to Alaska. It is not a high quality jacket as it does have feather quills working their way out some, but overall I am happy with this jacket and it is very compact!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but warm!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is lightweight, warm and fits nicely. I love it! I've had so many compliments and people have asked where to buy one. I've worn this in the rain with the hood up and it kept me completely dry from waist up. The cinch in the hood keeps rain out. This works in cool and cold weather. I've worn it in Texas 50 degree weather and in Alaska. Works well in both climates!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Attwood

customer_reviews.title: Good for wind, not for wet weather!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I'd worn this jacket in the rain, and it was quite disappointing. I was absolutely soaked- the jacket it NOT waterproof- water gets through the seams of it and completely soaked me on my way to class. Outside maybe 10 min, and my entire shirt looks like I ran a marathon in the middle of Arizona. Overall, a tad disappointed, since I liked it so much for it's warmth in the wind. :(
customer_reviews.author: Alli Richmond

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is great! It is just as nice as the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great! It is just as nice as the ones from Columbia or Patagonia. The only caveat is that the feathers do come out occasionally. However, I wear a sweater underneath this with a scarf and I was pretty warm in 50 degree NorCal weather.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Love

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One con: NOT BREATHABLE. So if you're walking around a lot, prepare to sweat quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nishi

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't quite ready to throw down money for Patagonia or Marmot, and this jacket seems to do the trick. It's surprisingly warm, and packs down really small. I wore it on a camping trip, and friends were amazed that it was Amazon brand. It seems like it will hold up over time, but I'm sure that's where there might be a difference with a more expensive product. But I'm happy for now!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Very thin. Sheds.
customer_reviews.text: It was super thin. Feathers were shedding out of the coat. Size down if ordering. I ended up returning it because it was not as warm as i was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Attention tall gals! Sleeves are long!!!  :)
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great! I am 5’10” and have a hard time finding sleeves that are long enough- this jackets sleeve length is perfect. Sizing is spot on too. Color is not as bright as picture, more of a maroon/brick red to me. Totally worth the price. Tried taking A pic against white and wood so you can get a sense of the color.
customer_reviews.author: GoBizGo

customer_reviews.title: Not for extreme cold
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight. True to size. It's definitely not for extreme cold weather and little too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat a size up to wear while I was pregnant, it was a perfect fit for almost all 9 months. My only complaint is the about of feathers that the coat leaves behind.
customer_reviews.author: Courts12

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this !
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this!! It's very soft - love the fabric !!! The perfect weight.....Bought it to go to England in early April. I did scotch guard it - and it took the 'spray' with streak no marks. Warm and lightweight- just love this. Will be buying another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: cal-mom

customer_reviews.title: great fit, but it sheds
customer_reviews.text: love the look and fit. Too bad the tiny down comes through the fabric and sticks to my black car seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I finally found one with a great color for women. I love mine. Light weight and easy to pack. Haven’t tried it in cold weather yet but looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kymm  Pask

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this jacket! I took it to Paris and believe it or not it was perfect for the winter. The only downside is that the feathers start coming out after a couple of wear but it is so lightweight and easy to pack. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Raghu

customer_reviews.title: Not a Women’s Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Even though it states that it is “Women’s”, the zipper and the cut are definitely made for a man. The black is a very matte shade, which I prefer to shiny. However, it looks like a very casual jacket that should cost less than it does.
customer_reviews.author: cvw

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Buy in lilac color and it is very pretty, good finish but it is very thin. In my country it is not cold and for the moment I will not be able to use it to know if it protects from the cold or rain. The presentation in color, size and finish is good.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect was a little hard to figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect was a little hard to figure out how to put into pouch but I figured it out. Will take up very little room and is very light weight which is good since we are limited on weight for Mission Trip to Brazil.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good slim puffy jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coat for a decent price. I sized up to a medium figuring I'd wear sweatshirts under it. Wore it to an outdoor concert when it was 37 degrees out (wore a thick sweater under and $1 rain poncho over) with rain/snow mix and felt great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin J Janowiak

customer_reviews.title: Keep scrolling
customer_reviews.text: Returning the jacket. I get it's light weight but it feels I spent 65.00 on cheap fabrics and air
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for travel to a colder climate
customer_reviews.text: I had to pack very light for my 10 day trip to Ireland. I only took a small carryon and that made me think of ways to save space. This is an absolute must have to save space in your luggage but still have a very warm and stylish jacket. love it!
customer_reviews.author: caroline kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is very warm for how thin and packable it is. It's similar quality to name brand jackets from an expensive outdoors store but for much cheaper. No regrets here!
customer_reviews.author: smj13

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Soft, durable, color just like it is pictured. It kept me warm without looking like a marshmallow. I wanted a thinker jacket. This hit all my targets. I bought it khaki.
customer_reviews.author: Melany C.

customer_reviews.title: Like the jacket, but...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is well made. Order a size larger if you want it a bit roomy. The storage pouch is cut too small! Please consider correcting this for future buyers. Will use mine to store wool mittens and try to find a bit bigger one for the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3", 140 and bought a small. I really should have bought a medium. It fits my torso but if I raise my arms it comes up higher than I would like. The jacket is warmer than I expected for the price. All in all this is a great jacket for layering.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10 and 155lbs. I got the medium and it fits perfectly. Being tall, I have longer arms and it's difficult to find coats with long enough sleeves. These hit right at the wrist for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Amazon Essentials product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Amazon Essentials product. Love it. Warm enough for 40C weather with a layer. Color is gorgeous. Price point so much better than NorthFace similars. However, I am not sure how long this will last. Feels a little flimsy. My north face jackets last me decades. I would think of this as a lightweight fashion staple in the wardrobe. Good for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Anubhuti J.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great fit, colour, packs really small and light, warm when needed- keeps body temp just right
customer_reviews.author: helen r evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Warm and waterproof. Fits nicely and not bulky. Comes with a pouch to store it in. I got it in red which is not too bright or dark.
customer_reviews.author: Karin E. Given

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Returned the jacket because it would leave my print everywhere (sheds everywhere).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: To small to be sizes large. White stuff coming out from the jacket. Not happy at all. Had to returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Esqueda

customer_reviews.title: Light, portable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 feet tall, 117 lbs and found the Small to be quite flattering and comfortable. It's been a bit chilly in Chicago (about 40 degrees) and so far it has kept me warm. Love that it has a hood and packs down to a very small size. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Nice color. Very light weight. Looking forward to wearing it outside in 30 degree weather. Will update when that occurs.
customer_reviews.author: GeeMee

customer_reviews.title: No inner pockets.
customer_reviews.text: The inside pockets aren’t actually pockets which was really disappointing. When I tried to return this jacket it doesn’t show up in my orders so I wasn’t able.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coat
customer_reviews.text: It is amazingly lightweight yet keeps you warm! Only reason I am returning it is its boxy cut, I was looking for something more fitted to my body shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect and great price. I'd prefer larger sizes but not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for layering.
customer_reviews.text: Nice brick color. Not too much shine. Decent quality lightweight down puff jacket. Fit is ok for large chest. Arms a tad long but that's how jackets are for me. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: candace austin

customer_reviews.title: I like that they have zipper pockets on the sides
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fit perfectly and was exactly what I was looking for! I like that they have zipper pockets on the sides. The material wasn’t shiny and cheap looking, so I appreciate that. I’m 5’1” and weigh 95lbs and an x-small fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Stram

customer_reviews.title: slim fit
customer_reviews.text: It is cut high under the arms with a slim body, which seems to be popular. I prefer a looser fit.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. Perfect for early morning bike rides to school then stuff in backpacks in the warmer afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Thai Qi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, seems well made
customer_reviews.text: This coat is so much nicer than expected. Well made, lightweight but surprisingly warm. Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Michelerp

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jacket for a trip to Iceland in summer. It was the perfect outer layer for warmth on the chilly days and nights. I ordered a small so I could layer underneath. I'm 5'4" and 125 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

An Amazon brand - Contoured seams bring a fitted shape to this water-resistant quilted jacket featuring hood and down fill for warmth and compressibility

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
feature_bullets: Shell: 100% Nylon; Lining: 100% Nylon; Fill: 90% Duck Down, 10% Feather
Contoured seams bring a fitted shape to this water-resistant quilted jacket featuring hood and down fill for warmth and compressibility
Packs neatly into included carrying bag with drawstring closure
Winter made better: we listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort
